bibl.title: The Egerton Gospel and New Testament Textual Transmission.
The New Testament Text in Early Christianity. Proceedings of the Lille Colloquium, July 2000. Le texte du Nouveau Testament au d√©but du christianisme. Actes du colloque de Lille, juillet 2000
bibl.note: P. Egerton 2 (= van Haelst 586). - [Introduction.] - Description of the papyrus. - Literature. - Re-edition. - Contents. - Relationship of the Egerton Gospel to New Testament transmission. - Criteria for comparing the Egerton text with the canonical texts. - Order of materials within pericopes. - Combining of scattered elements. - Adaptation and re-working of materials. - Conflation. - A generalising tendency in the Egerton Gospel. - Motivation. - Vocabulary. - Handwriting. - Dating. - Some conclusions. - Pp. 233-234: Appendix. Translation of Egerton Pap. 2 (selected passages).
